item.title: Nuwaragala Srilanka Amazing place
item.description: Believed to be the hideout of Prince Saddatissa during his time of rancor together with his brother the first rate King of Sri Lanka King Dutugamunu, Nuwaragala in step with outstanding archeologist Ellawala Medhananda Thera was a monastery constructed by means of King LajjaThissa, who ruled the united states of america 119-109 BC.

item.title: The Sacred Tooth Relic Dalada Maligawa
item.description: History of the Temple of the Tooth Emphasis In the early days, Kandy was known as “Sri Senkanda Beneficiary Sri Vardhanapura”.
